description:
Check out the trailer for My Hero Academia: You're Next, an anime film coming to theaters in the U.S. and Canada starting October 11, 2024.

Set after the conclusion of My Hero Academia Season 6 and right before the final battle between heroes and villains, My Hero Academia: You're Next sees Deku and his friends face a new threat—a mysterious figure calling himself Dark Might and claiming to be the new Symbol of Peace.

#IGN #Anime #MyHeroAcademia
title: My Hero Academia: You're Next - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

description:
Peter Jackson presents a groundbreaking journey back to Middle-earth through the eyes of legendary director Kenji Kamiyama. Check out the trailer for The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim for a look at this upcoming anime film. The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim features the voice talents of Brian Cox (“Succession”) as Helm Hammerhand, the mighty King of Rohan; Gaia Wise (“A Walk in the Woods”) as his daughter Héra; and Luke Pasqualino (“Snowpiercer”) as Wulf. Miranda Otto, who delivered an unforgettable, award-winning performance in “The Lord of the Rings” Trilogy, reprises her role as Éowyn, Shieldmaiden of Rohan, who serves as the tale’s narrator. 

The voice ensemble also includes Lorraine Ashbourne (Netflix’s “Bridgerton”), Yazdan Qafouri (“I Came By”), Benjamin Wainwright (“World on Fire”), Laurence Ubong Williams (“Gateway”), Shaun Dooley (“The Witcher”), Michael Wildman (“Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw”), Jude Akuwudike (“Beasts of No Nation”), Bi
title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim - Official Trailer (2024) Miranda Otto, Brian Cox

description:
IGN sat down with Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2's international PR Manager from Warhorse Studios – Tobi Stolz-Zwilling to break down an extended look at gameplay highlighting the cinematic scope of the game, how dialogue affects small & large moments in gameplay, combat, new weapons, an overview of Kuttenberg, map size, and so much more.
Step into the grieves of Henry of Skalitz when Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 comes to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series consoles, and PC on February 11, 2025.

Presented by Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 Developer Gameplay Commentary | gamescom 2024

description: Black Myth: Wukong may be more forgiving than a soulslike, but that doesn't mean that its combat is easy. Here are 10 essential combat tips to help you master the combat of Black Myth: Wukong, covering tips on how to best use focus, when to use your spells, and best general practices that will help make your combat more efficient.
title: Black Myth Wukong: Don't Make These Critical Combat Mistakes! - Essential Combat Guide

description:
Post Trauma is a horror game inspired by classic genre-defining games from past decades. In the game, you play as Roman, a middle-aged train conductor who is trapped in a terrifying, twisted reality. Explore the unknown, unravel mysteries, and try to survive the unspeakable horrors that lurk in these threatening surroundings.

Post Trauma will be released on PC and consoles on October 29th, 2024.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Post Trauma - Official Date Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2024

description:
Watch the latest S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl trailer for another look at the world and what possibly awaits outside of the dark side of the zone in this upcoming game that combines first-person shooter elements with immersive sim mechanics and horror. S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl will be available on PC and Xbox Series X/S on November 20, 2024.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Official Trailer | gamescom 2024

description: Learn more about the magical sport, see character customization options, and more from this latest Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions trailer. Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions will be available on PlayStation, Xbox, and PC on September 3, 2024, and coming to Nintendo Switch this holiday season.
title: Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions - Official 'Magic is in the Air' Trailer

description:
Get a deep dive into the world of GreedFall 2: The Dying World in this early access overview trailer. Learn about Greedfall 2's story setting, companions you can meet, how you can shape your own story, and more from this upcoming RPG. Uprooted from the island of your birth, find your freedom, explore the old continent and forge your destiny through alliances, scheming and battles in Greedfall 2. GreedFall 2 launches on Steam Early Access on September 24, 2024. Greedfall 2 will be available on Xbox Series X|S, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: GreedFall 2: The Dying World - Official Early Access Overview Trailer | gamescom 2024

description:
The classic turn-based strategy game series returns to PC (via Steam Early Access) with Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era, as you return to the world of Enroth and explore the beginning of the franchise's saga. Expect a full non-linear campaign as well as randomly generated scenarios, co-op and multiplayer modes, and user-generated content, courtesy of an in-game map and campaign editor. A release window has not yet been announced.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era – Official Reveal Trailer

description:
Welcome back to Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast. On a very special gamescom 2024 edition, your hosts - Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Rachel Weber, and Justin Davis - are discussing gamescom highlights like Indiana Jones and Secret Level. Then it's time to check in with Game of the Year Watch.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Game of the Year Watch 2024 Continues | gamescom 2024

description: Learn more about Team17 came up with the galaxy-brained idea to turn household objects into potential romantic partners voiced by the biggest actors in gaming and anime in Date Everything!, a comedic dating simulator.
title: Date Everything! - Game Overview | gamescom 2024

description: Check out Stoic's chaotic free-to-play team based adventures (and misadventures) in Towerborne, coming to Xbox Series X/S and PC on September 10.

title: Planet Coaster 2 - Gameplay Trailer | gamescom 2024

description: Fight against your childhood fears alone or with the help of a friend in Little Nightmares 3, the latest entry in Supermassive Games' co-op horror puzzle game, coming to Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, and PC in 2025.
title: Little Nightmares 3 - Gameplay Overview Trailer | gamescom 2024

description: Check out new content like a career simulator, landing challenges, and other goodies coming to Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 for Xbox Series X/S and PC on November 19.

description:
It is not easy, but it's fun, to be a squirrel with a gun! Check out the fun Squirrel With a Gun launch trailer for another look as this bushy-tailed menace causes ultimate chaos in this upcoming sandbox action game. Squirrel with a Gun will be available on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) on August 29 2024, and coming to PS5 and Xbox Series X/S in fall 2024.

Birthday cake hijinks, haircuts via flying drones, toy car stunts surrounded by explosions - that’s the zany action Squirrel with a Gun has stashed and waiting for fans willing to breach a top-secret underground facility in search of the truth. If an entire neighborhood is terrorized along the way, well … that’s just the collateral damage of finding coveted, priceless golden acorns.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Squirrel with a Gun - Official Launch Trailer | gamescom 2024

description: Uncover the truth behind Khazan's exile and learn quintessential tips on combat within the upcoming action RPG The First Berserker: Khazan. Coming to PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PC, Xbox Series X and Series S in 2025.
title: The First Berserker: Khazan - Gameplay Overview Trailer | gamescom 2024

description:
S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl's Game Director and Technical Producer set the stage for the open-world FPS game's long-awaited release on November 20, 2024.

Presented by World of Warcraft: The War Within

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2 Devs Confident They'll Make November Release Date | gamscom 2024

description:
IGN's partnered with Mino Games for a booth tour of their gamescom 2024 booth! Join founder and CEO of Mino Games, Sasha McKinnon for a crash-course introduction into the Dimensionals universe! Dimensionals is more than just a turn-based roguelike RPG! It's a multimedia franchise with a comic and animated series to boot!

Wishlist Dimensionals on Steam!

Presented by Dimensionals.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Mino Games Booth Tour & Dimensionals Game Overview | gamescom 2024

description:
AtomFall is a new first-person action RPG from Rebellion, developer of the Sniper Elite series. Ben Fisher, Associate Head of Design, fell into IGN's gamescom 2024 studio to introduce us to this new world.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Atomfall: Kill Everyone - or No One | gamescom 2024

description:
We've been hands on with Monster Hunter Wilds at Gamescom 2024, and it looks like Capcom have snuck in a couple of game changing updates into the monster slaying fold, with the likes of the Seikret, a brand new dinosaur-esque mount, and deadly weather storms, plus more!

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Monster Hunter Wilds: How Mounts & Weather Change The Game | gamescom 2024

description: Learn more about weapon upgrades, experience, and attack combos work in Redacted, a new zombie roguelike action game from The Calisto Protocol developer Striking Distance.
title: Redacted - Game Overview  | gamescom 2024

description: Season one details for The First Descendent have been revealed, showcasing New invasion dungeons, powers, ultimates, and a new scout, Hailey Scott coming August 29th.
title: The First Descendent - Season One Gameplay Overview Trailer | gamescom 2024

description: Celebrate 10 years of Elder Scrolls Online with Richard Lambert and Matt Firor and what new adventures lie in wait with Gold Road's latest update.
title: The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: Gold Road - Game Overview | gamescom 2024

description: Explore all to come within the World of Warcraft World Soul Saga with Ion Hazzikostas and Tina Wang.

description:
The Batman Arkham series finally returns, and this time in a whole new reality. Find out how it plays, how open it is, and why it's a prequel to Asylum.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Why Batman: Arkham Shadow Is Set Between Origins and Asylum | gamescom 2024

description: Track down your foes like wild dogs, collect cards, and stay vigilant in the upcoming free-to-play shooter game FragPunk. Closed beta set to begin this October!
title: FragPunk - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | gamescom 2024

description:
Dune: Awakening is almost upon us, and we met up with Joel Bylos, the Chief Creative Officer of Funcom, to get the gamescom 2024 breakdown on everything Spice, Sandworms, and the Fremen!

Presented by Dimensionals

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: How Spice, Sandworms & the Fremen Work in Dune: Awakening | gamescom 2024

description: Delve deep into World of Warcraft The War Within, bringing new features, raids, zones, and more. Early access begins today for those who pre-purchased, while the full launch takes place August 26th.
title: World of Warcraft The War Within Gameplay Overview Trailer | gamescom 2024

description:
On the eve of Star Wars Outlaws' release, Creative Director Julian Gerighty and lead actress Humberly González stop by IGN's gamescom 2024 studio to launch us into the galaxy far, far away.

Presented by Dimensionals

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: How Star Wars Outlaws' Lead Found Out She Was in a Star Wars Game | gamescom 2024

description:
One of the most intriguing projects featured at gamescom 2024 isn’t a game at all, but an animated series. Prime Video’s Secret Level is an anthology series by the creators of Love, Death + Robots. Each episode is basically a short film inspired by the characters and worlds of iconic video games like God of War, Mega Man, Unreal Tournament, and Pac-Man.

The first trailer for the series gives us a brief glimpse of these gorgeously animated shorts and the often surprising ways in which they reinvent familiar gaming icons. But which games are featured in the series, and is that really Keanu Reeves piloting a mecha suit? Let’s break down exactly what we see in the trailer.

#gaming #secretlevel #ign
title: Secret Level: Every Video Game In The New Trailer

description:
Now that we finally have a release date for Indiana Jones & the Great Circle, Creative Director Axel Torvenius and Design Director Jens Andersson sat down with us to break down that gamescom 2024 trailer.

Presented by PAYDAY 3

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: How Indiana Jones & the Great Circle's Replayability Works | gamescom 2024

description:
Dying Light: The Beast was recently announced at Gamescom 2024, and we've seen it, but does more guns equal more fun? With Kyle Crane returning, and back stronger than ever thanks to years of experiments, do these changes for the first standalone Dying Light game translate to a more fun, action-packed experience? Let's dive in to find out.

Presented by Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Dying Light: The Beast Has Way More Guns Than We Expected | gamescom 2024

description:
Take a look at some brand-new Black State gameplay. A new sci-fi shooter that blends elements of Metal Gear Solid, Max Payne, and Inception, this 4K gameplay shows off some of the combat and graphical power that the Motion Blur developed game contains.

Please note that this is an RTX tech demo, not a finished gameplay or full trailer for *Black State*. It’s a brief look at how the game feels with RTX enabled. We appreciate your understanding and support!
title: 8 Minutes of Black State Gameplay (4K RTX)

description: Tag 2 aus dem gamescom studio 2024, neben spannenden Videospielen wie Marvel Rivals, Diablo IV: Vessel of Hatred oder Little Nightmares 3 schauen wir uns auch die Cards & Boards Area mit unter anderem Lorcana genauer an!
title: IGN gamescom studio 2024 - Tag 2: Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred, Gothic: Remake & mehr! (GERMAN)

description:
Journey to a cursed kingdom in this reveal trailer for Croak, an upcoming 2D precision platformer game. The trailer for Croak showcases platforming gameplay as a prince-turned-frog navigates a 'fractured fairytale' world. Croak will be available on PC via Steam with additional platforms to follow. 

Croak is a twisted, delightful, and often harrowing fable of Frogo’s quest to get back to his hexed home and unravel the mystery to ultimately lift the curse.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Croak - Official Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2024

description:
Drop into the magical world of Mystralia in this Echoes of Mystralia reveal trailer, an upcoming rogue-lite action RPG, where you have control over spells you craft, the way you fight, and the path of your adventure. Meet the characters, see gameplay, and learn about your journey in this trailer for Echoes of Mystralia, a follow-up to Mages of Mystralia. Echoes of Mystralia is slated for release on PC on Steam with additional platforms to follow.

As Mazarim, a protector of the Cycle of Memories, return to the magical world of Mystralia and step outside yourselves to connect with people, defeat creatures and, above all, collect memories to restore balance in this deeply narrative and mystical journey of enlightenment.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Echoes of Mystralia - Official Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2024
Sims-like game made in Unreal Engine 5 #gamescom2024

description:
Xbox is at gamescom 2024 with one of its biggest booths yet! Jane Douglas of Outside Xbox, and Simon Cardy from IGN teamed up to take on Doom: The Dark Ages (and a massive Doomguy), Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, plus an extremely intense 4D immersive ride with the World of Warcraft Escape from Dalaran experience, and more!

#ign #gamescom2024
title: Crazy Warcraft 4D Experience & More at the Xbox Gamescom Booth | gamescom 2024

description:
Check out the new Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel trailer, announcing that the demo for the roguelike horde arena survival game is available now on Steam (PC).
Set in a dark Viking underworld, Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel challenges you to fight waves of enemies to earn divine blessings from ancient Norse Gods. Summon powerful bosses, venture through hostile realms, and become a god-like warrior. Watch this Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel gameplay for a look at what to expect ahead of the game's planned release in Q4 2024.
title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel - Official Demo Announcement Trailer

description:
Xbox is making their presence at gamecom 2024 bigger than ever, including 3 days of livestreams, with each day kicking off with a Bethesda stream at 5am PDT / 8am EST / 1pm BST / 2pm CEST, and the official Xbox livestream beginning at 6am PDT / 9am EDT / 2pm BST / 3pm CEST.

Xbox’s first livestream day will feature S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl, Atomfall, Age of Mythology, and more!

This originally aired on IGN on August 21, 2024 at 6AM PT.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Xbox @ gamescom 2024: Live From the Showfloor Day 1

description:
Day 1 of IGN’s live coverage will feature developer interviews with Diablo IV, Avowed, Monster Hunter Wilds, Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero, Marvel Rivals and more.

This originally aired on IGN on August 21, 2024 at 6AM PT.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: gamescom Studio Day 1 Livestream 2024: Diablo 4, Avowed, Marvel Rivals, and More!

description:
We went hands-on with Monster Hunter Wilds, and it's shaping up to be a great balance between what made both World and Rise so great.

#IGN #Gaming #MonsterHunterWilds
title: Monster Hunter Wilds Hands-on: Exactly What I Hoped For

description:
Join lead game designer Chaz Barker, lead environment artist Tamires Para, and project lead Peter Maurice for a deeper look at Starship Troopers: Extermination. The team discusses the Tanker Bug enemy, showcases the new planet Boreas, and the single-player experience of the upcoming up-to-16-player FPS game. Starship Troopers: Extermination leaves Early Access and will be available on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X/S on October 11, 2024.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2024
title: Starship Troopers: Extermination - Official Developer Diary Video | gamescom 2024
